targets.rawSql:
select  
	destination_cluster as "Destination Cluster", 
	case 
		when ((count(case when reachability = 'true' then 1 else null end) * 100) / count(*)) >= 90 then 2
		when (count(case when reachability = 'false' then 1 else null end) = count(*)) then 0
		else 1
	end as "Reachability"
from 
(
	SELECT r2.cluster_id, r2.cluster_name, r2.destination_cluster, r2.reachability, r2.reachability_type 
	from reachability r2 JOIN organizations o on r2.organization_id  = o.organization_id 
	where 
		o.organization_name  IN ('$OrganizationName') and
		r2.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
		$__timeFilter(r2.test_time) and
		r2.host_name in ($HostName) and
		r2.reachability_type='udp'
	order by r2.destination_cluster 
) t
group by destination_cluster 
order by "Reachability" asc

select  
	destination_cluster as "Destination Cluster", 
	case 
		when ((count(case when reachability = 'true' then 1 else null end) * 100) / count(*)) >= 90 then 2
		when (count(case when reachability = 'false' then 1 else null end) = count(*)) then 0
		else 1
	end as "Reachability"
from 
(
	SELECT r2.cluster_id, r2.cluster_name, r2.destination_cluster, r2.reachability, r2.reachability_type 
	from reachability r2 JOIN organizations o on r2.organization_id  = o.organization_id 
	where 
		o.organization_name  IN ('$OrganizationName') and
		r2.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
		$__timeFilter(r2.test_time) and
		r2.host_name in ($HostName) and
		r2.reachability_type='tcp'
	order by r2.destination_cluster 
) t
group by destination_cluster 
order by "Reachability" asc

SELECT 
  r.test_time as "time",
  r.port as "Port"
FROM reachability r join organizations o on r.organization_id = o.organization_id
WHERE 
  r.port in (
  	SELECT distinct port from reachability r join organizations o on r.organization_id = o.organization_id
  	where 
  		o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
  		r.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
  		r.host_name in ($HostName) and 
  		r.reachability='true' and 
  		r.reachability_type = 'udp' and
  		r.port > 50000 and
  		$__timeFilter(test_time)
  ) and
  $__timeFilter(test_time) and
  o.organization_name IN ('$OrganizationName') and
  r.cluster_name IN ($ClusterName) and
  r.destination_cluster IN ($DestinationCluster) and
  r.host_name IN ($HostName) and 
  r.reachability='true' and 
  r.reachability_type = 'udp'
group by r.port, r.test_time
order by "time"

SELECT 
  r.test_time as "time",
  r.port as "Port"
FROM reachability r join organizations o on r.organization_id = o.organization_id
WHERE 
  r.port in (
  	SELECT distinct port from reachability r join organizations o on r.organization_id = o.organization_id
  	where 
  		o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
  		r.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
  		r.host_name in ($HostName) and 
  		r.reachability='false' and 
  		r.reachability_type = 'udp' and
  		r.port > 50000 and
  		$__timeFilter(test_time)
  ) and
  $__timeFilter(test_time) and
  o.organization_name IN ('$OrganizationName') and
  r.cluster_name IN ($ClusterName) and
  r.destination_cluster IN ($DestinationCluster) and
  r.host_name IN ($HostName) and 
  r.reachability='false' and 
  r.reachability_type = 'udp'
group by r.port, r.test_time
order by "time"

SELECT 
  r.test_time as "time",

FROM reachability r join organizations o on r.organization_id = o.organization_id
WHERE

  	where

  		r.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and

select r.timestamp as "Timestamp", r.organization_id as "Organization ID", r.cluster_name as "Cluster_Name", r.host_name as "Host Name", r.destination_cluster as "Destination Cluster", r.test_time as "Test Time", r.reachability_type as "Reachability Type", r.port as "Port", r.reachability as "Reachability"
from reachability r join organizations o on r.organization_id = o.organization_id
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and r.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and r.host_name in ($HostName) and r.reachability_type='udp' and $__timeFilter(r.test_time)

select r.timestamp as "Timestamp", r.organization_id as "Organization ID", r.cluster_name as "Cluster Name", r.host_name as "Host Name", r.destination_cluster as "Destination Cluster", r.test_time as "Test Time", r.reachability_type as "Reachability Type", r.port as "Port", r.reachability as "Reachability"
from reachability r join organizations o on r.organization_id = o.organization_id
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and r.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and r.host_name in ($HostName) and r.reachability_type='tcp' and $__timeFilter(r.test_time)

list.definition:
select distinct cluster_name from reachability r  join organizations o 
on o.organization_id = r.organization_id 
where organization_name in ('$OrganizationName')
list.label: Select Cluster Name
list.name: ClusterName

on o.organization_id = r.organization_id 
where organization_name in ('$OrganizationName')
